items.author: Pete Hammond
items.content: What MORE could audiences want from a movie than this hilarious, heartwarming entertainment for all ages?

items.author: Owen Gleiberman
items.content: Toy Story 3 is a salute to the magic of making believe.

items.author: Michael Rechtshaffen
items.content: Woody, Buzz and playmates make a thoroughly engaging, emotionally satisfying return.

items.author: Bill Goodykoontz
items.content: Toy Story 3 is very much a worthy entry in the series, a movie well worth making (and seeing). It continues the legacy. It just doesn't expand upon it.

items.author: Kimberley Jones
items.content: I laughed more (sincerely, full-throatedly) at Toy Story 3’s smart comedy than at any other film of the still-young summer movie slate.

items.author: James Berardinelli
items.content: Toy Story 3 enhances the legacy of its brand while providing exceptional entertainment value for viewers of all ages, especially for those who favor the brighter, livelier 2-D iteration over the 3-D gimmick.

items.author: Joshua Rothkopf
items.content: Clearly, Pixar’s genius for adventurous storytelling continues unabated.
TS3, like its predecessors, is a clever, engrossing adventure.
This tertiary adventure delivers welcome yet nonessential fun, landing well after its creators have grown up and succeeded toying with more sophisticated stories.
